line_1: Or of its rough coat strip the pear,
line_2: Whate'er you do, where'er you are,

line_1: And here of lovely dye, the Cath'rine pear,
line_2: O may no wight e'er penny-less come there,

line_1: And here of lovely dye, the Cath'rine pear,
line_2: Lest smit with ardent love he pine with hopeless care!

line_1: The golden Apple, and the mellow Pear,
line_2: Here hanging Gardens rich with Fruit appear;
